basics.name: TaeKyung Kwak
basics.label: AI/Data Engineer | Fullstack App Developer
basics.summary:
I enjoy working with AI and coding, with particular interest in AI/Data, Flutter, and Rust.
 For me, development does not end at implementation — I value understanding concepts deeply and applying them to real services.
 I am growing as a Machine Learning Engineer and AI-driven service developer, with experience in App launches, Dataset publication, VS Code extension development, Hardware optimization, Multi-cloud environments, and Offline team collaboration.

projects.name: Cat Can Talk
projects.description: A Flutter + FastAPI based chatbot app, can see a real-time animated GIF of a cat's emotions.
highlights: Used Upstage's Solar Pro 2. It has good performance and cheap API.
Used nginx, certbot for https authentication.

projects.name: Collatz Conjecture project
projects.description: Generated and published a 100m Collatz sequence dataset.
highlights: Published on Hugging Face with 500+ downloads, Graph image page 1000+ view
Optimized computation using Rust, C++, and Cuda

projects.name: VS Code Sketchbook Theme
projects.description: A custom VS Code theme with Orbit fonts and unique color palettes.
highlights: Featured in Flutter Developer Community, Linkedin

projects.name: d3letters
projects.description: App that comes with 3 letters a day.
highlights: The letter is a good sentence. It is excerpted from sentences in CBT, philosophy, literature, etc.
Using GitHub Gist, letter maintenance is possible without updating the app.

projects.name: poe chatbot
projects.description: Two philosopher chatbots available on the Poe platform

projects.name: Blog with Flutter and SEO
projects.description: Moving from Gitbook to a site I developed myself.
highlights: I developed my own blog for freedom.
Azure static web app, Firebase, Flutter, Zola
To achieve both design and SEO, I used Flutter and HTML.
Flutter, Firebase, and Azure have been connected, and details are under development.

projects.name: project plan
highlights: Program for visualizing Keras, data structures/algorithms. I plan to use Flutter, Python packages, and Matplotlib.
Developing a store automatic payment program. It can be installed as an app on tablets, and custom designs are provided for each store. Flutter and TossApi are planned to be used.

I felt uncomfortable with the unintuitive grammar of the pandas, and I got to know the Polars written in rust. I am looking for and studying the parts that can be contributed in the Pollas > Numpi zero-copy function, __array__.

skills.name: Cloud & Infra
keywords: Elice cloud, Google colab, Kaggle, Hugging face
